013package org.apache.juneau.http.part;
014
015import java.util.NoSuchElementException;
016
017import org.apache.http.*;
018import org.apache.juneau.common.internal.*;
019
020/**
021 * Basic implementation of a {@link PartIterator}.
022 *
023 * <h5 class='section'>Notes:</h5><ul>
024 *    <li class='warn'>This class is not thread safe.
025 * </ul>
026 *
027 * <h5 class='section'>See Also:</h5><ul>
028 *    <li class='link'><a class="doclink" href="https://juneau.apache.org/docs/topics/JuneauRestCommonBasics">juneau-rest-common</a>
029 * </ul>
030 */
031public class BasicPartIterator implements PartIterator {
032
033   private final NameValuePair[] entries;
034   private final String name;
035   private final boolean caseInsensitive;
036
037   private int currentIndex;
038
039   /**
040    * Creates a new part iterator.
041    *
042    * @param parts An array of parts over which to iterate.
043    * @param name The name of the parts over which to iterate, or <jk>null</jk> for all.
044    * @param caseInsensitive Use case-insensitive matching for part name.
045    */
046   public BasicPartIterator(NameValuePair[] parts, String name, boolean caseInsensitive) {
047      this.entries = Utils.assertArgNotNull("parts", parts);
048      this.name = name;
049      this.caseInsensitive = caseInsensitive;
050      this.currentIndex = findNext(-1);
051   }
052
053   private int findNext(int pos) {
054
055      int from = pos;
056
057      int to = entries.length - 1;
058      boolean found = false;
059      while (!found && (from < to)) {
060         from++;
061         found = filter(from);
062      }
063
064      return found ? from : -1;
065   }
066
067   private boolean filter(int index) {
068      return (name == null) || eq(name, entries[index].getName());
069   }
070
071   @Override /* Iterator */
072   public boolean hasNext() {
073      return (currentIndex >= 0);
074   }
075
076   @Override /* Iterator */
077   public NameValuePair next() throws NoSuchElementException {
078
079      int current = currentIndex;
080
081      if (current < 0)
082         throw new NoSuchElementException("Iteration already finished.");
083
084      currentIndex = findNext(current);
085
086      return entries[current];
087   }
088
089   /**
090    * Not supported.
091    */
092   @Override /* Iterator */
093   public void remove() throws UnsupportedOperationException {
094      throw new UnsupportedOperationException("Not supported.");
095   }
096
097   private boolean eq(String s1, String s2) {
098      return Utils.eq(caseInsensitive, s1, s2);
099   }
100}
